profileAlternative.name: Damian Gaweda
profileAlternative.headline: Founder and Haskell developer at GetRedirects SEO Tool

positions.title: Founder and Haskell developer
positions.description:
GetRedirects is a tool that helps SEO professionals create 301 redirects automatically.

Whether your client has 404 / crawl errors on their website or they are relaunching the site with a new URL structure you can ensure that their ranking remains intact using 301 redirects. GetRedirects uses Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing to create them for you.

Early access is free! Sign up at https://getredirects.com

given.text:
I worked with Damian for over 2.5 years and always felt that he provided the most effective solutions for our clients. He was always a pleasure to work with and delivered the highest quality of work. I would recommend Damian as a technical consultant and as a developer. Would be more than happy to work with him again in the future.
…
See more

Damian had a huge amount of responsibility at Brilliant, this included development, writing documentation, team management and meeting with clients. I have only worked with Damian for a short time but was quite impressed at his ability to manage so many different functions and do them so well. Damian is undoubtedly a highly competent technical manager with a great deal of knowledge and experience. I would love to work with Damian again should the opportunity arise..
…
See more

Damian is one of the best technical managers I've ever worked with. He is talented, charming, knowledgeable and positive. He's delivered great work in a high pressure environment. Good leadership and decision making skills. Clients and colleagues always enjoy working with Damian and I hope to again soon.

received.text: It was a pleasure to work with Divya at Brilliant. She has proved on many occasions that she can deliver projects successfully as well as manage clients' expectations. Her professional attitude and dedication made her an invaluable asset to the company and a great colleague. I recommend Divya to anyone looking for a Senior Project Manager.

I've worked with Van for 6 months at Brilliant UK. She's expert at successfully delivering projects as well as building positive and strong client relationships, providing knowledge, support and reassurance that clients seek. I could not recommend Van enough to any company seeking the ultimate Project Manager.
